body: You can throw a flask of acid as a splash weapon. Treat this attack as a ranged touch attack with a range increment of 10 feet. A direct hit deals 1d6 points of acid damage. Every creature within 5 feet of the point where the acid hits takes 1 point of acid damage from the splash.
name: Acid
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Equipment/Goods And Services/Special Substances and Items/Acid
